== Amakusa casualties ==
Hobbs gives 157 lives lost in Gray's sinking of ''Amakusa'', while our own article on ''Amakusa'' refers to sources which list 71 casualties. [https://legionmagazine.com/en/2006/03/valour-in-the-navy/ This article] reconciles the figures by identifying 157 as the total casualties among the Japanese ships sunk at Onagawa Bay. [[User:Choess|Choess]] ([[User talk:Choess|talk]]) 19:58, 18 October 2014 (UTC)
